member.name: F:Xenko.VirtualReality.DummyDevice.UseGyroscope
member.summary: Use the gyroscope of the device to simulate device orientation changes.

member.name: F:Xenko.VirtualReality.DummyDevice.BuildMirror
member.summary: If true, build the mirror view.

member.name: F:Xenko.VirtualReality.OculusOvr.SessionStatus.IsVisible
member.summary: True if the process has VR focus and thus is visible in the HMD.

member.name: F:Xenko.VirtualReality.OculusOvr.SessionStatus.HmdPresent
member.summary: True if an HMD is present.

member.name: F:Xenko.VirtualReality.OculusOvr.SessionStatus.HmdMounted
member.summary: True if the HMD is on the user's head.

member.name: F:Xenko.VirtualReality.OculusOvr.SessionStatus.DisplayLost
member.summary: True if the session is in a display-lost state. See ovr_SubmitFrame.

member.name: F:Xenko.VirtualReality.OculusOvr.SessionStatus.ShouldQuit
member.summary: True if the application should initiate shutdown.

member.name: F:Xenko.VirtualReality.OculusOvr.SessionStatus.ShouldRecenter
member.summary: True if UX has requested re-centering.

member.name: M:Xenko.VirtualReality.TouchController.IsPressedDown(Xenko.VirtualReality.TouchControllerButton)
member.summary: Returns true if in this frame the button switched to pressed state

member.name: M:Xenko.VirtualReality.TouchController.IsPressed(Xenko.VirtualReality.TouchControllerButton)
member.summary: Returns true if button switched is in the pressed state

member.name: M:Xenko.VirtualReality.TouchController.IsPressReleased(Xenko.VirtualReality.TouchControllerButton)
member.summary: Returns true if in this frame the button was released

member.name: M:Xenko.VirtualReality.TouchController.IsTouchedDown(Xenko.VirtualReality.TouchControllerButton)
member.summary: Returns true if in this frame the button switched to pressed state

member.name: M:Xenko.VirtualReality.TouchController.IsTouched(Xenko.VirtualReality.TouchControllerButton)
member.summary: Returns true if button switched is in the pressed state

member.name: M:Xenko.VirtualReality.TouchController.IsTouchReleased(Xenko.VirtualReality.TouchControllerButton)
member.summary: Returns true if in this frame the button was released

member.summary: Oculus: B

member.summary: Oculus: X

member.name: P:Xenko.VirtualReality.VRDevice.ViewScaling
member.summary: Allows you to scale the view, effectively it will change the size of the player in respect to the world, turning it into a giant or a tiny ant.
member.remarks: This will reduce the near clip plane of the cameras, it might induce depth issues.

member.name: T:Xenko.XenkoVersion
member.summary: Internal version used to identify Xenko version.
member.remarks: Note: Xenko.xkpkg and PublicVersion versions should match. Also, during package build, PackageUpdateVersionTask is updating that file and expect some specific text regex so be careful if you change any of this.

member.name: F:Xenko.XenkoVersion.PublicVersion
member.summary: The version used by editor for display purpose. 4th digit needs to be at least 1 if used (due to NuGet special cases).

member.name: F:Xenko.XenkoVersion.AssemblyVersion
member.summary: The current assembly version as text, currently same as .

member.name: F:Xenko.XenkoVersion.NuGetVersionSimple
member.summary: The NuGet package version without special tags.

member.name: F:Xenko.XenkoVersion.NuGetVersion
member.summary: The NuGet package version.

member.name: F:Xenko.XenkoVersion.NuGetVersionSuffix
member.summary: The NuGet package suffix (i.e. -beta01). Note: might be replaced during package build.

member.name: F:Xenko.XenkoVersion.AssemblyInformationalVersion
member.summary: The informational assembly version, containing -dev or -g[git_hash] during package.

member.name: F:Xenko.XenkoVersion.AssemblyInformationalSuffix
member.summary: The assembly suffix. Note: replaced by git commit during package build.

members.member: Finds the active installation of vrclient.dll and initializes it
unloads vrclient.dll. Any interface pointers from the interface are invalid after this point
